title: Arianna Schivo
text:
Arianna Schivo (born 16 September 1986) is an Italian Olympic <a href="eventing">eventing</a> rider. She competed at the <a href="2016%20Summer%20Olympics">2016 Summer Olympics</a> in <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro">Rio de Janeiro</a> where she finished 34th in the <a href="Equestrian%20at%20the%202016%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Individual%20eventing">individual</a> and 9th in the <a href="Equestrian%20at%20the%202016%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Team%20eventing">team</a> competition.
Schivo also participated at the <a href="2015%20European%20Eventing%20Championships">2015 European Eventing Championships</a>, where she placed 6th with the Italian team in the team event and finished 28th individually.
Her father <a href="Gian%20Marco%20Schivo">Gian Marco Schivo</a> was a finalist in the <a href="high%20jump">high jump</a> competition at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
